1.title: Here Kitty Kitty

episode of.title: Lexi & Lottie: Trusty Twin Detectives (TV Series 2016–2017)

1.plot:

2.title: Art for Art's Sake

episode of.title: Lexi & Lottie: Trusty Twin Detectives (TV Series 2016–2017)

2.plot: A gorilla at the Animal Park loves to paint, but someone steals her paintings.

3.title: Case of the Missing Case

episode of.title: Lexi & Lottie: Trusty Twin Detectives (TV Series 2016–2017)

3.plot: When a valuable violin goes missing in the Animal Park, the suspects include another violin player and a music shop owner.

4.title: Pig on the Lamb

episode of.title: Lexi & Lottie: Trusty Twin Detectives (TV Series 2016–2017)

4.plot: Lexi, Lottie and Fred's investigations around a missing pig lead them to a children's author who is writing a crime book with a pig as the main character.

5.title: Tammy the Turtle

episode of.title: Lexi & Lottie: Trusty Twin Detectives (TV Series 2016–2017)

5.plot: When Tammy the Turtle falls mysteriously ill, Lexi and Lottie suspect someone has poisoned her.

6.title: Panda-Monium

episode of.title: Lexi & Lottie: Trusty Twin Detectives (TV Series 2016–2017)

6.plot: Lexi and Lottie, wearing panda costumes, try to earn money for a new panda enclosure by busking in town. At the same time, two crooks - also wearing panda costumes as disguises - are robbing a bank.

7.title: Fowl Play

episode of.title: Lexi & Lottie: Trusty Twin Detectives (TV Series 2016–2017)

7.plot: It's the day of the school Science Fair and Lexi has a winner of a project. But when she overhears a plot to rob the school canteen, she's locked in a stationary storeroom and can't investigate the crime or show her science project.

8.title: Hoodwinked!

episode of.title: Lexi & Lottie: Trusty Twin Detectives (TV Series 2016–2017)

8.plot: There has been a particularly large litter of baby ermines at the Animal Park and Dad has organized for the neighboring Uberwood Animal Sanctuary to adopt them. But Lexi and Lottie soon discover that it's a con.

9.title: Where's Charlie?

episode of.title: Lexi & Lottie: Trusty Twin Detectives (TV Series 2016–2017)

9.plot: Identical twins, Lexi and Lottie, are fed up with being mistaken for each other so they decide to change their appearance so people can tell them apart and they stop working as a duo.

10.title: Double Trouble

episode of.title: Lexi & Lottie: Trusty Twin Detectives (TV Series 2016–2017)

10.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

11.title: The Great Diamond Heist

episode of.title: Lexi & Lottie: Trusty Twin Detectives (TV Series 2016–2017)

11.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

12.title: Crime of Fashion

episode of.title: Lexi & Lottie: Trusty Twin Detectives (TV Series 2016–2017)

12.plot: When clothes go missing from clotheslines across Appleton, the detectives are on the case. They discover two different animal species are working in cahoots to swipe the clothes for a lady selling them at a market stall.

13.title: Art Attack

episode of.title: Lexi & Lottie: Trusty Twin Detectives (TV Series 2016–2017)

13.plot: The detectives are befuddled by a very arty attack on the Animal Park and across Appleton, but a fake story published in the Appleton telegraph flushes out the perps.

14.title: Pull the Wool

episode of.title: Lexi & Lottie: Trusty Twin Detectives (TV Series 2016–2017)

14.plot: When it looks like sheep rustlers have struck, Lexi, Lottie and Fred investigate to find the real fraudsters and reveal the clever trick they played.

15.title: Spike the Hedgehog

episode of.title: Lexi & Lottie: Trusty Twin Detectives (TV Series 2016–2017)

15.plot: The Animal Park is raising funds to build Wildlife Crossing tunnels by selling cute plush toys of the wildlife. When the detectives discover lots of their plush toys are suddenly being returned, broken, they investigate.

16.title: Fur Enough

episode of.title: Lexi & Lottie: Trusty Twin Detectives (TV Series 2016–2017)

16.plot: The McKenzies are trying out two new attractions at the Animal Park; a holiday program for children and a sunset concert for adults, featuring a world-famous singer, Katerina Katt.

17.title: Aliens in Appleton

episode of.title: Lexi & Lottie: Trusty Twin Detectives (TV Series 2016–2017)

17.plot: When strange phenomena appear around Appleton - crop circles in the snow, flashing lights in the sky - Lexi believes they may be alien visitors. But Lottie is convinced they're a man-made hoax.

18.title: Elephant Call

episode of.title: Lexi & Lottie: Trusty Twin Detectives (TV Series 2016–2017)

18.plot: When an elephant starts acting strangely, our twin detectives uncover that she is calling out to her long lost sister six miles away.

19.title: Things That Go Screech in the Night

episode of.title: Lexi & Lottie: Trusty Twin Detectives (TV Series 2016–2017)

19.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

20.title: Appleton Fair Day

episode of.title: Lexi & Lottie: Trusty Twin Detectives (TV Series 2016–2017)

20.plot: When a green tree python, Grandpa, six baby ducks, the mother duck and a string of hand-made, organic, hormone free pork and fennel sausages go missing all at once, Lexi and Lottie investigate.

21.title: Caramel & Peanut Butter

episode of.title: Lexi & Lottie: Trusty Twin Detectives (TV Series 2016–2017)

21.plot: When a pregnant giraffe gets sick because it has been fed candy, Lexi and Lottie are determined to find the culprit, but things get complicated when someone starts stealing bags from visitors at the zoo.

22.title: Boar Necessities

episode of.title: Lexi & Lottie: Trusty Twin Detectives (TV Series 2016–2017)

22.plot: When a keeper at the Animal Park is missing from duty it looks like wild boar piglet might pine and starve, until Lexi and Lottie follow the clues and find him.

23.title: Game of Drones

episode of.title: Lexi & Lottie: Trusty Twin Detectives (TV Series 2016–2017)

23.plot: The animals are suddenly noisy at night. The twins sleuths and Fred discover they're being set off by a drone flown by a developer who wants to close the Park and build a shopping centre.

24.title: Samphire & Seaweed Scandal

episode of.title: Lexi & Lottie: Trusty Twin Detectives (TV Series 2016–2017)

24.plot: When two chefs competing in Appleton's 'Supreme Chef' competition have their special sea vegetables stolen from their rooftop gardens, Lexi and Lottie investigate.

25.title: The Appleton Cat Burglar

episode of.title: Lexi & Lottie: Trusty Twin Detectives (TV Series 2016–2017)

25.plot: The detectives investigate a series of thefts from the Animal Park that lead them to a cat burglar of the feline kind. This leads them to solve a series of real cat burglaries in Appleton homes.

26.title: The Case of the Appleton Swordsman

episode of.title: Lexi & Lottie: Trusty Twin Detectives (TV Series 2016–2017)

26.plot: When Lexi and Lottie help Dad collect an old draft horse from Farmer Wong, they discover an old clue in a saddlebag.

imdb.plot outline: Being identical twin sisters is an asset for 12-year-old detectives Lexi and Lottie, especially when it comes to cracking crimes in their country town of Appleton and its Animal Park. Everyone knows two heads are better than one. Add a little twin telepathy to the mix, a pet mouse with a nose for clues, and their smart comic journalist friend Fred - and you have a dynamic crime solving combination that leaves local crims scratching their heads - how can these kids out-smart them? Lexi, Lottie, Fred and Mozart the mouse leave no stone unturned when it comes to solving crimes in their town - such as missing persons, animal theft, art fraud, diamond heists, animal poaching, sabotage and much much more. Grandpa is usually around when a little advice is needed, and Mum and Dad are always supportive of their daughters. No misdeed is too minor and no animal caper is too crafty for this dynamic detective team.
